headlines: Ship Modern Web Apps in Seconds
The Ultimate CLI for Multi-Framework Development
Stop Configuring. Start Building with NEXO.
subheadlines: Scaffold React, Next.js, and modern web stacks instantly.
AI-Native CLI with first-class orchestration support.
Zero config fatigue. Best practices built-in by default.
hero.description: NEXO is the definitive CLI for React, Next.js, and modern web frameworks. Powered by AI-Native context and high-performance orchestration, get a production-ready codebase in seconds.

features.title: React 19 & Vite
features.description: The latest React features including Actions and unified Hooks, powered by lightning-fast Vite builds.
features.benefit: Future-proof your stack with the latest industry standards.

features.title: TypeScript First
features.description: Full type safety out of the box with modern TS 5.7+ standards and clean configurations.
features.benefit: Catch errors early and enjoy superior IDE support.

features.title: Tailwind & shadcn/ui
features.description: Native integration with Tailwind CSS v4 and shadcn/ui for beautiful, accessible components.
features.benefit: Standardized, modern UI layer ready for immediate customization.

features.title: AI-Native Context
features.description: Auto-generated AI instructions and modular Cursor rules tailored to your specific tech choices.
features.benefit: AI assistants understand your project structure perfectly.

features.title: Security Hardening
features.description: Built-in SBOM generation, zero-trust patterns, and automatic security audits with 'nexo health'.
features.benefit: Enterprise-grade security from the first line of code.

features.title: Maintenance Suite
features.description: Power tools for project health: doctor, health, undo, migrate, and automatic update commands.
features.benefit: Keep your projects healthy and modern with ease.

features.title: Visual Testing Ready
features.description: One-click Storybook or Ladle integration with automatic story generation for your components.
features.benefit: Verify and document your UI in isolation without effort.
